Pontypool, Monmouthshire Promoted in aid of Hospital funds. Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £3. March contest 1st(£1.1s.) Taff Merthyr, 2nd (10s.) Blaina. 5 bands competed.
